 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==the under part== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***), hence as **adverb accusative** and **preposition** ==underneath, below, instead of== (so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תחת‎</span>, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תחת‎</span> ([[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>385</sup>); Biblical Aramaic [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּחוֺת‎</span>, Palmyrene in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מן לתחת‎</span> [[BDB#Tariff|Tariff]] [[Gen.1.4|Gen 1:4]] ([[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>320</sup>), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ); — 

**1.** as **adverb accusative** [[Gen.49.25|Gen 49:25]] (= [[Deut.33.13|Deut 33:13]]) the deep <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבֶצֶת תָּ֑חַת‎</span> that coucheth ***beneath***; more usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתָּחַת‎</span> literally ***off*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> **1 c**) ***the under part = beneath***, [[Exod.20.4|Exod 20:4]] (= [[Deut.5.8|Deut 5:8]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאָרֶץ מִתָּ֑חַת‎</span> (so [[Deut.4.39|Deut 4:39]]; [[Josh.2.1|Josh 2:1]]l [[1Kgs.8.23|1Kgs 8:23]] [both [[BDB#D|D]]<sup>2</sup>], [[Isa.51.6|Isa 51:6]]), [[Deut.33.27|Deut 33:27]]; [[Judg.7.8|Judg 7:8]]; [[Amos.2.9|Amos 2:9]]; [[Isa.14.9|Isa 14:9]]; [[Job.18.16|Job 18:16]]; [[Ezek.47.1|Ezek 47:1]]b **II.** as **preposition**; so construct, and with suffix (usually in the plural, and so literally ***in the parts underneath***) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתַּי‎</span> [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]]+, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַתֵּנִי‎</span> (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בַּעֲדֵנִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺדֶנִּי‎</span>: [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:103d»§ 103d</sup>) [[2Sam.22.37|2Sam 22:37]]; [[2Sam.22.40|2Sam 22:40]]; [[2Sam.22.48|2Sam 22:48]] ([[Ps.18.37|Ps 18:37]]; [[Ps.18.40|Ps 18:40]]; [[Ps.18.48|Ps 18:48]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּ֑י‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתֶּיךָ‎</span>; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּיו‎</span> ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתּוֺ‎</span> [[2Sam.2.23|2Sam 2:23]]; [[2Sam.3.12|2Sam 3:12]]; [[2Sam.16.8|2Sam 16:8]]; [[Job.9.13|Job 9:13]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּחְתֶּיהָ‎</span> [[Lev.13.23|Lev 13:23]] + 16 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתֶּ֫נָּה‎</span> (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵינֶנָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺדֶנָּה‎</span>) [[Gen.2.21|Gen 2:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתֵּינוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.14.9|1Sam 14:9]]; [[Ps.47.4|Ps 47:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתֵּיהֶם‎</span> [[Josh.2.14|Josh 2:14]]; [[Amos.2.13|Amos 2:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתֵּיהֶם‎</span> [[Num.16.31|Num 16:31]]; [[1Kgs.20.24|1Kgs 20:24]]; [[1Chr.4.41|1Chr 4:41]]; [[1Chr.5.22|1Chr 5:22]]; [[2Chr.12.10|2Chr 12:10]] (for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּם‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.27|1Kgs 14:27]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּם‎</span> [[Deut.2.12|Deut 2:12]] + 10 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתֵּקהֶן‎</span> [[Jer.28.13|Jer 28:13]] — 

**1.** ***under, beneath***, [[Gen.7.19|Gen 7:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁמַיִם תַּחַת כָּלֿ‎</span> ***under*** the whole heaven (so [[Deut.2.25|Deut 2:25]]; [[Deut.4.19|Deut 4:19]]; [[Job.28.24|Job 28:24]]; [[Job.37.3|Job 37:3]]; [[Job.41.3|Job 41:3]]; [[Dan.9.12|Dan 9:12]]), [[Dan.18.4|Dan 18:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֵץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, [[Dan.21.15|Dan 21:15]]; [[Dan.24.2|Dan 24:2]] + often; [[Job.30.14|Job 30:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁוֺאָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תּ‎</span> ***under*** the crash they roll themselves against me; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Eccl.1.3|Eccl 1:3]]; [[Eccl.1.9|Eccl 1:9]]; [[Eccl.1.13|Eccl 1:13]] + often Ecclesiastes (so in Phoenician, [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>4. 7; 5. 12</sup>). With <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> [[2Chr.4.3|2Chr 4:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת לוֺ‎</span>, [[Song.2.6|Song 2:6]] = [[Song.8.3|Song 8:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְראֹשִׁי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>. Idiomatic 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת הָהָר‎</span> ***at the foot of*** the mountain, [[Exod.24.4|Exod 24:4]]; [[Deut.4.11|Deut 4:11]], so [[Deut.3.17|Deut 3:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַשְׁדֹּת הַפִּסְגָּה ת‎</span> [[Josh.11.3|Josh 11:3]]; [[Josh.11.17|Josh 11:17]] +; figurative [[Ps.18.37|Ps 18:37]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּ֑י תַּרְחִיד אְעָדַי‎</span> thou broadenest mysteps ***under me***, [[Job.36.15|Job 36:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַחַב לאֹ מוּצָק תַּחְתֶּיךָ‎</span> (so read for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תחתיה‎</span>, [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]) breadth unstraitened is ***beneath thee.*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַלָּשׁוֺן ת‎</span>, of something held there as a dainty morsel, and ready, when needed, to be brought out, figurative of sweetness [[Song.4.11|Song 4:11]], of evil [[Ps.10.7|Ps 10:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשֹׁנוֺ עָמָל וָאָוֶן ת‎</span>, [[Job.20.12|Job 20:12]] (so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁפָתֵימוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Ps.140.4|Ps 140:4]]), of praise [[Ps.66.17|Ps 66:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשֹׁנוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרוֺמַם ת‎</span> (synonym <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּגְרוֺנָם‎</span> [[Ps.149.6|Ps 149:6]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת פ‎</span>: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***a***) of subjection, [[Ps.18.40|Ps 18:40]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּ֑י תַּכְּ רִיעַ קָמַי‎</span>, v[[Ps.18.48|Ps 18:48]] (compare [[Ps.47.4|Ps 47:4]]; [[Ps.144.2|Ps 144:2]]), [[Ps.45.6|Ps 45:6]]; [[Job.9.13|Job 9:13]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***b***) of a woman, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישָׁתּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, i.e. under his authority, [[Num.5.19|Num 5:19]]; [[Num.5.20|Num 5:20]]; [[Num.5.29|Num 5:29]], so [[Ezek.23.5|Ezek 23:5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתַּי‎</span> being ***under me*** = being ***mine*** (figurative of Israel as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s spouse), compare <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὕπανδρος</span> [[Rom.7.2|Rom 7:2]], and <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Qor 66:10. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***c***) of being burdened or oppressed under, [[Isa.24.5|Isa 24:5]] the earth <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָֽשְׁבֶיהָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָֽנְפָה ת‎</span>, [[Prov.30.21|Prov 30:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלוֺשׁ רָגְזָה אֶרֶץ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, v[[Prov.30.22|Prov 30:22]] v[[Prov.30.23|Prov 30:23]]; [[Hab.3.7|Hab 3:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָיֶן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> i.e. (si vera 1.) suffering ***under*** calamity. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַד פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, of authority or control, [[Gen.41.35|Gen 41:35]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַד פַּרְעֹה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְיִצְבְּרוּ בָר ת‎</span>; [[Judg.3.30|Judg 3:30]] (compare [[Ps.106.42|Ps 106:42]]), [[1Sam.21.4|1Sam 21:4]]; [[1Sam.21.5|1Sam 21:5]] (strike out <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>; dittograph <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֹל‎</span>), v.[[1Sam.21.9|1Sam 21:9]]; [[Isa.3.6|Isa 3:6]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלֵי פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, of subjection or conquest, [[Ps.8.7|Ps 8:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלָיו כֹּל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁתָּה ת‎</span>, [[Ps.18.39|Ps 18:39]]; [[Ps.47.4|Ps 47:4]]; [[Lam.3.34|Lam 3:34]], compare [[Mal.3.31|Mal 3:31]]. 

**2.** ***what is under*** one, ***the place in which*** one stands: hence as accusative, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with reflexive pronoun, idiomatic, ***in one's place, where one stands***, [[Exod.16.29|Exod 16:29]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּיו שְׁבוּ אִישׁ‎</span> abide every one ***in his place***, [[Lev.13.23|Lev 13:23]]; [[Lev.13.28|Lev 13:28]]; [[Josh.5.8|Josh 5:8]]; [[Josh.6.5|Josh 6:5]]; [[Josh.6.20|Josh 6:20]]; [[Judg.7.21|Judg 7:21]]; [[1Sam.14.9|1Sam 14:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעָמַדְנוּ תַחְתֵּינוּ‎</span> we will ***remain where we are***, [[2Sam.2.23|2Sam 2:23]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיָּמָת תַּחְתָּו‎</span> he died ***where he was*** (compare [[Jer.38.9|Jer 38:9]] [read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמֵת‎</span>]), [[Jer.7.10|Jer 7:10]]; [[Isa.25.10|Isa 25:10]]; [[Isa.46.7|Isa 46:7]]; [[Amos.2.13|Amos 2:13]]; [[Hab.3.16|Hab 3:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְתַחְתַּי אֶרְגָּ֑ז‎</span> I tremble ***where I stand***, [[Zech.12.6|Zech 12:6]]; [[Zech.14.10|Zech 14:10]]; [[Job.36.20|Job 36:20]]; [[Job.40.12|Job 40:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּם‎</span> 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** in transferred sense, ***in place of, instead of: (a)*** [[Gen.2.18|Gen 2:18]]; [[Gen.4.25|Gen 4:25]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶבֶל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> ***instead of*** Abel, [[Gen.22.13|Gen 22:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּנוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, [[Gen.30.2|Gen 30:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אלהיס אנכי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲת‎</span> (compare [[Gen.50.19|Gen 50:19]]), [[Gen.44.33|Gen 44:33]]; [[2Sam.19.1|2Sam 19:1]] + often; [[Job.16.4|Job 16:4]]; [[Isa.3.24|Isa 3:24]]; [[Isa.55.13|Isa 55:13]]; [[Isa.61.3|Isa 61:3]]; [[Isa.61.7|Isa 61:7]] of one succeeding to the place of another, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחְתָּיו וַיִּמְחֹ‎</span> [[Gen.36.33|Gen 36:33]]-49 [[1Kgs.8.20|1Kgs 8:20]]; [[1Kgs.11.43|1Kgs 11:43]]; [[1Kgs.14.20|1Kgs 14:20]] + often, [[Deut.2.12|Deut 2:12]]; [[Deut.2.21|Deut 2:21]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיֵָּֽשְׁבוּ תַחְתָּם‎</span>, [[Lev.16.32|Lev 16:32]]; [[1Kgs.2.35|1Kgs 2:35]] +; [[Ps.45.17|Ps 45:17]] ***in place of*** thy fathers (whom thou mayest therefore forget) will be thy children. compare in Ph [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>i.3.9</sup> ([[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>30</sup>). Sq. infinitive [[Isa.60.15|Isa 60:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֱיוֺתֵח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> ***instead of thy being . . .*** Peculiarly [[Job.34.26|Job 34:26]] (si vera lectio)= ***as if they were, like***; but text very dubious; [[BDB#Bi|Bi]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּחֵת חֲמָתוֺ רְשָׁעִ֑ים‎</span> his wrath breaketh in pieces the wicked. ***(b)*** in particular, of things mutually interchanged, ***in place of, in exchange*** or ***return for:*** [[Gen.30.15|Gen 30:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דּוּדָאֵי בְנֵח‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> ***in return, for*** thy son's love-apples, [[Exod.21.23|Exod 21:23]]) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֶפְשׁ‎</span>life ***for*** life, v[[Exod.21.24|Exod 21:24]] v[[Exod.21.25|Exod 21:25]] v[[Exod.21.26|Exod 21:26]] v[[Exod.21.27|Exod 21:27]] v[[Exod.21.36|Exod 21:36]] v.[[Exod.22.37|Exod 22:37]], [[Josh.2.14|Josh 2:14]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשֵׁנוּ תַחְתֵּיכֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָמוּת‎</span>, [[1Sam.2.20|1Sam 2:20]]; [[1Kgs.20.39|1Kgs 20:39]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפשׁו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נפשׁך ת‎</span>, v[[1Kgs.20.42|1Kgs 20:42]] (compare [[2Kgs.10.24|2Kgs 10:24]]), [[2Kgs.21.2|2Kgs 21:2]]; [[Isa.43.3|Isa 43:3]]; [[Isa.43.4|Isa 43:4]] often with verbs of requiting, [[Gen.44.4|Gen 44:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טוֺבָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָ֫מּה שִׁלַּמְתֶּם רָעָה ת‎</span> why have ye rewarded evil ***in exchange for good ***? [[1Sam.25.21|1Sam 25:21]]; [[2Sam.16.12|2Sam 16:12]]; [[2Sam.19.22|2Sam 19:22]]; [[Ps.35.12|Ps 35:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎טוֺבָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשַׁלְּמוּנִי דָעָה ת‎</span>, [[Ps.38.21|Ps 38:21]]a; [[Ps.109.4|Ps 109:4]]; [[Ps.109.5|Ps 109:5]]; [[Prov.17.3|Prov 17:3]] +; [[Jer.5.19|Jer 5:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת מֶה‎</span> ***in return for what***? (compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלמֶֿה‎</span> [[Jer.22.8|Jer 22:8]]; [[Deut.29.23|Deut 29:23]]; [[1Kgs.9.8|1Kgs 9:8]]). So followed by infinitive [[Ps.38.21|Ps 38:21]]b. 

**3.** as **conjunction: a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת אֲשֶׁר‎</span>: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ $\quad$ (***a***) ***instead of that*** (German. ***anstatt dass***), [[Deut.28.62|Deut 28:62]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֱיִיתֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> ***instead of that*** ye were..., ***instead of*** your being.., [[Ezek.36.34|Ezek 36:34]]. ***(b)*** ***in return for*** (the fact) ***that, because that*** ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">ἀνθ’ ὧν</span> [[Amos.1.3|Amos 1:3]] + often), [[Num.25.13|Num 25:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲשֶׁר קִנָּא לא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, [[Deut.21.14|Deut 21:14]]; [[Deut.22.29|Deut 22:29]]; [[Deut.28.47|Deut 28:47]]; [[1Sam.26.21|1Sam 26:21]]; [[2Kgs.22.17|2Kgs 22:17]] = [[2Chr.34.25|2Chr 34:25]]; [[Isa.53.12|Isa 53:12]]; [[Jer.29.19|Jer 29:19]]; [[Jer.50.7|Jer 50:7]]; [[2Chr.21.12|2Chr 21:12]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת כִּי‎</span> [[Deut.4.37|Deut 4:37]] (but ? read : <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וֶַתּחִי‎</span> as end of v[[Deut.4.36|Deut 4:36]]), [[Prov.1.29|Prov 1:29]]. compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵקֶב אֲשֶׁר (כִּיׅ‎</span>. **III** ==compounds:== — 

**1.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלתַּֿחַת‎</span>, after a verb of motion: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** (***in***) ***under***, [[Judg.6.19|Judg 6:19]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיּוֺצֵא אֶלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאֵלָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>, [[1Kgs.8.6|1Kgs 8:6]] (\|\| [[2Chr.5.7|2Chr 5:7]]), [[Jer.3.6|Jer 3:6]]; [[Jer.38.11|Jer 38:11]] (on [[1Sam.21.5|1Sam 21:5]] see **II. 1 d**); ==after== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרָא‎</span> [[Zech.3.10|Zech 3:10]]: so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלתֿ‎</span> [[Ezek.10.2|Ezek 10:2]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***into the place of***, [[Lev.14.42|Lev 14:42]]. 

**2.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת‎</span> (= <span class="bdbLangGreek">ὑπ’ ἐκ</span>): 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** alone, ***from under, from beneath*** as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת הַשָּׁמַיִם‎</span> [[Gen.1.7|Gen 1:7]], and especially after such verbs as <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁחֵת‎</span> [[Gen.6.17|Gen 6:17]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָחֶה‎</span> [[Exod.17.14|Exod 17:14]]; [[Deut.9.14|Deut 9:14]]; [[Deut.25.19|Deut 25:19]]; [[Deut.29.19|Deut 29:19]]; [[2Kgs.14.27|2Kgs 14:27]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֶאֲבִיד‎</span> [[Deut.7.24|Deut 7:24]], compare [[Lam.3.66|Lam 3:66]]; [[Ezek.47.1|Ezek 47:1]] a <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפְּתַּן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבַּיִת‎</span>, [[Prov.22.27|Prov 22:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָ֫מָּה יִקַח מִשְׁכָּֽבְּךָ מִּתַּחְתֶּיךָ‎</span>; [[Exod.6.6|Exod 6:6]]; [[Exod.6.7|Exod 6:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִבְלוֺת מִצְרַיִם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּ‎</span>, [[Hos.4.12|Hos 4:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֱלֹהֵיהֶם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּזְנוּ מִתּ‎</span> (compare **II. 1 c** ***a, b***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַד פ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּ‎</span> (compare **II. 1 d**) ***from under the hand*** (power) ***of*** ... [[Exod.18.10|Exod 18:10]]; [[2Kgs.8.20|2Kgs 8:20]]; [[2Kgs.8.22|2Kgs 8:22]]; [[2Kgs.13.5|2Kgs 13:5]]; [[2Kgs.17.7|2Kgs 17:7]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחְתָּיו‎</span> (compare **II. 2 a**) ***from his place*** [[Exod.10.23|Exod 10:23]]; [[Zech.6.12|Zech 6:12]]. Rarely = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת לְ‎</span>, [[Gen.1.9|Gen 1:9]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Ezek.1.8|Ezek 1:8]]; [[Ezek.42.9|Ezek 42:9]]; [[Ezek.46.23|Ezek 46:23]]; [[Job.26.5|Job 26:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת לְ‎</span> (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִמַּעַל לְ‎</span>) ***under, beneath:*** [[Gen.1.17|Gen 1:17]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּיִם אֲשֶׁר מִתּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָרָקִיעַ‎</span>, [[Exod.20.4|Exod 20:4]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמַּיִם מִתַּחַת לָאָרֶץ‎</span> (so [[Deut.4.18|Deut 4:18]]; [[Deut.5.8|Deut 5:8]]), [[Judg.3.16|Judg 3:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמַדָּיו‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּ‎</span>, [[Jer.38.12|Jer 38:12]] +; of locality, [[Gen.35.8|Gen 35:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְבֵיתְאֵל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתּ‎</span>, [[1Sam.7.11|1Sam 7:11]]; [[1Kgs.4.12|1Kgs 4:12]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְמִתַּחַת לְ‎</span> ( compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> **9 b**), ***id quod*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת לְ‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.32|1Kgs 7:32]].
